data.title: Nathan Roby - Football

Nathan Roby (18) WR  - 2022


	Played in 10 games in his second collegiate season, rushing the ball as well as splitting wide as a receiver
	Rushed 20 times

Historical

Biography

2022

Played in 10 games in his second collegiate season, rushing the ball as well as splitting wide as a receiver

Rushed 20 times for 69 yards, and also caught 12 passes for 75 yards

Had his best game of the year against Slippery Rock, rushing six times for 51 yards and catching four passes for 27 yards (10/29)

Returned four kicks for 62 yards against Edinboro (10/22)

2021: Made collegiate debut against Gannon (9/25)... played in five games... posted 33 rushing yards in his debut... put up 110 yards between both rushing and receiving against Indiana (10/9)... scored his first career touchdown against Edinboro on a 16 yard pass (11/6)... had four kick returns against Mercyhurst for 48 total yards (10/30).

High School: Three-sport athlete that earned four letters each in indoor track & field and outdoor track & field, and three in football... part of track & field team's 2019 WPIAL team championship... 2019 6A First Team All-Conference DB... 2019 6A Second Team All-Conference ATH... 2018 Second Team All-Conference DB... 2019 Pittsburgh Post-Gazette Week 9 Male Athlete of the Week.... totaled 2,337 rushing yards on 311 carries (7.5 ypc) with 28 rushing touchdowns... also recorded 906 receiving yards and eight receiving touchdowns... posted 277 tackles and seven interceptions... set three career records - career rushing touchdowns (28), career total touchdowns (36) and career rushing years (2,337)... also set season records for rushing touchdowns (19) and total touchdowns (25)... set the track & field team's record in the 100m with a 10.96.

Personal: Full name is Nathan Gene Roby... intends to major in Business Economics... son of Susie Amicone and Lew Amicone (stepfather), and Jason Roby (father).... has two brothers, Sean and Scott Amicone... has two sisters, Lily and Emma Roby... uncle Herbert Gene Roby ran track & field at West Virginia before being drafted into the Vietnam War.

Career Highs:

Rushing Attempts 8 vs Indiana (PA) 10/09/21 Rushing Yards Net 66 vs Indiana (PA) 10/09/21 Longest Rushing 23 at Gannon 09/25/21 Receptions 4 vs Indiana (PA) 10/09/21, vs Slippery Rock 10/29/22 Receptions Yards 44 vs Indiana (PA) 10/09/21 Receptions Touchdowns 1 at Edinboro 11/06/21 Longest Reception 16 at Edinboro 11/06/21 Longest Punt Return 19 vs Edinboro 10/22/22 Longest Kick Return 19 at Bloomsburg 09/10/22, vs Edinboro 10/22/22 Total Tackles 1 at Seton Hill 10/08/22, at Mercyhurst 10/15/22, at Indiana (PA) 11/05/22
